alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 11:42AM AKST until December 26 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow, strong winds and wind chills to 55 below. East winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times in blowing snow. * WHERE...Over Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts could form. The dangerously cold wind chills to 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
